scripts.backup:create: echo 'Creating tokens backup...' && cp -r dist .backups/dist-$(date +%Y%m%d-%H%M%S) && echo 'Backup created successfully'
scripts.backup:restore: echo 'Restoring tokens from backup...' && git checkout HEAD -- dist/ && pnpm run build && echo 'Tokens restored successfully'
scripts.disaster-recovery: echo 'Starting disaster recovery...' && git pull origin main && pnpm run build && echo 'Disaster recovery completed'
